id: scenario-autonomous-entity-community-investor-scenarios-municipality-community investment enables municipal small business preservation
title: Community investment enables municipal small business preservation
description: Community investment enables municipal small business preservation
content:
Scenario: Community investment enables municipal small business preservation
    Given small business displacement threatens community character and economic diversity
    And Patricia values preserving local businesses as community institutions
    When community investment supports exit-to-community conversions
    Then small businesses are preserved as democratic enterprises, not displaced by chains
    And municipal economic diversity is maintained through democratic conversions
    And community investment becomes small business preservation strategy
    And neighborhood character is protected through democratic ownership
    And municipality_elohim tracks small business preservation through community investment
